body:
Fixes #8507.

- [x] fixes issues with pytest found in #8507.  It vendors a release-tarball version of pytest that reports the `3.2.5` version instead of `unknown`.
- [x] adds a proper `LICENSE` file and header for `pytest`
- [x] moves `spack.util.ordereddict` to an external `ordereddict_backport` package

@twang15 @adamjstewart
title: Fix pytest version check issues
